approval_data.project_name: V-KYC recordings to be fetched for Audit requirements
approval_data.project_summary: Develop a portal/dashboard for V-KYC team leads to access and download V-KYC recordings for audit purposes.
project_goals: Provide easy access to V-KYC recordings for audit requirements.
Reduce dependency on IT for retrieving recordings.
Improve efficiency of the V-KYC team in accessing recordings.
approval_data.business_context: The V-KYC team currently relies on the IT data server team to provide recordings, which are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server. This manual process is inefficient and time-consuming, especially for audit requirements.

requirements.description: A portal/dashboard should be created for accessing V-KYC recordings.
Access to the portal should be provided to the leads of VKYC process (TL & Process Manager).
All V-KYC recordings should be available on the portal.
Recordings should be fetched as and when required.
Recordings should be searchable by LAN ID.
Recordings should be available date and month wise.
Users should be able to upload a file (Excel or text) with a list of LAN IDs (up to 50) for bulk download.
The system should trigger a backend API call to process the bulk download request.
Results of the bulk download request should be displayed in a tabular format with a 'Download All' option.
The table should have pagination, displaying only 10 records at a time.
Only 10 records should be downloaded at a time during bulk download.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)

functional_requirements: Date and month-wise filtering of recordings.
Bulk download functionality via file upload.
Display of download results in a tabular format.
Download All option for bulk downloads.
Pagination for displaying and downloading records.
Integration with backend API for processing requests.
non_functional_requirements: The system should be accessible to authorized users only.
The system should provide a user-friendly interface.
The system should ensure data security and confidentiality.
The system should be able to handle the expected load of users and requests.
The system should provide fast response times for search and download operations.
The access for the screen will be available to very limited users (only Team leaders)
success_criteria: The portal is successfully deployed and accessible to authorized users.
Users can easily search and download V-KYC recordings.
The bulk download functionality works as expected.
The system meets the performance and security requirements.
The V-KYC team can access recordings independently, reducing dependency on IT.
constraints: Recordings are stored on the LTF ‘NFS(Network File System)’ server.
File upload should be csv/txt file.
File will contain min 2 and maxmium 50 LanIDs
assumptions: The necessary infrastructure and network connectivity are available.
The backend API for processing requests is available and functional.
The data on the NFS server is accessible and in a usable format.
The users have the necessary training to use the portal.
risks: Performance issues due to high traffic.
Integration issues with the backend API.

recommendations: Add more details about the security requirements.
Specify the performance requirements (e.g., response times).
Include details about error handling and logging.

identified_gaps: Error handling and logging details are not included.
recommendations_for_completion: Define specific security measures and access controls.
Establish performance benchmarks and response time targets.
Detail the error handling and logging mechanisms.
